name: Causal
description:
Game controller recommended.

Controls:Xbox 360 controller

Left stick to move. Right stick to look around.
Hold A to run. Hold LB to slow down time. Hold RB to make time faster.
Press Back to restart level. Hold Start for 2 seconds to go to menu.

Keyboard

WASD or arrow keys to move.

Hold LShift to run. Hold Q to slow down time. Hold E to make time faster.
Press R to restart level. Hold Escape for 2 seconds to go to menu.

Good luck!
